effect.name: Outer Glow
effect.description:
Apply an outer glow to the image.
Last Updated: 2022-05-03 18:23
effect.author: Looki, edit by NaitorStudios

parameter.name: Radius
parameter.description: Radius of the glow in pixels.

parameter.name: Exponent
parameter.description: The higher, the sharper the glow will be.

parameter.name: Alpha
parameter.description: The alpha coefficient of the glow.
